decision_conditions: No material samples have been provided in regard to Condition 3 (Samples). Samples for all facing materials are required. As such, the applicant has failed to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Insufficient information has been provided in regard to Condition 13 (Waste and Recycling). Information in the form of a plan need to be submitted to show the location of Waste and Recycling facilities. As such, the applicant has failed to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Insufficient information has been provided in regard to Condition 17 (Levels) Information in the form of plans and elevations relating to details of the existing and proposed levels across the site need to be submitted to ensure that the proposed building is going to be erected at a height no greater than the streetscene plans submitted with the original permission (21/02109/FUL) . As such, the applicant has failed to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (Materials), 9 (Sustainable Drainage Strategy),13 (Waste and Recycling), 17 (Levels) of planning permission 21/02109/FUL (Demolition of the existing dwelling and erection of new single dwelling)
